thread.title: Warriors meet Giants ahead of Titanic clash | UTV
thread.title_full: Warriors meet Giants ahead of Titanic clash | UTV - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Warriors meet Giants ahead of Titanic clash | UTV

organizations.name: british association of mixed martial arts

text:
Play video Northern Irish fighters will be among those battling for belts at the SSE Arena in the Titanic Quarter on Saturday night, as a major mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion stages its first event here.
BAMMA (British Association of Mixed Martial Arts) 28 sees undefeated Ballymena lightweight Rhys McKee defend his title against Merseyside man Tim Barnett, while flyweight Andy 'Taz' Young takes on London's Dominique Wooding for the interim belt.
Fermanagh fighter Glenn Irvine also faces Dubliner Keith McCabe in the welterweight division in a card stacked with local talent.
Ahead of the Belfast bouts, the MMA contenders met up with someone else who enjoys a scrap - Belfast Giants enforcer Adam Keefe.
UTV sports correspondent Ruth Gorman has more.
Last updated Tue 21 Feb 2017 Sport mixed martial arts mma
